duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop proposals and negotiate pricing within company margin guidance
Manage and maintain sales pipeline to generate new revenue
Meet or exceed monthly sales goals and initiatives
Record all sales activities, transactions, and communications with customers
Provide consultations and lead conference calls to facilitate sales conversations
Collaborate with Sales Engineer and Sales Support Team to determine appropriate solutions to meet customers’ needs

education_certification.credential: College degree and 1-3 years Sales, including B2B, experience; or High School diploma and 5+ years Sales, including 3-5 years B2B, experience; or an equivalent combination of education and professional level related experience required. 1-2 years Telecom experience preferred, but not required.
